com.java.model.map

Class GameMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.java.model.Observable
      • com.java.model.map.GameMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class GameMap
extends Observable
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    This class models the game map
    Version:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Arnav Bhardwaj, Karan Dhingra, Ghalia Elkerdi, Sahil Singh Sodhi, Cristian Rodriguez
    See Also:
